OD: For kcp(currency=KRW,merchant_id='NTT_JPMC') host page,when have the priority of the payment method in hosted page(web),high priority will be displayed in the front,and do AUTH(visa card) - Full capture and Full refund the same day

OD: For kcp(currency=KRW,merchant_id='NTT_V2') host page,when have the priority of the payment method in hosted page(wap),high priority will be displayed in the front,and do Purchase(local card) - multiple partial refunds the same day

systemQuery1: Payment request from NTT to kcp-direct
Payment response from kcp-direct to NTT
Refund request from NTT to kcp-direct
Refund response from kcp-direct to NTT

OD: For kcp(currency=KRW,merchant_id='NTT_JPMC') host page with selectedMethod=netbanking,when have the priority of the payment method in hosted page(web),high priority will be displayed in the front,netbanking icon is selected by default

For v2/paymentLinks with currency=JPY,merchant_id='NTT_JPMC',and selectedMethod=ministop,when have the priority of the payment method in hosted page(web),high priority will be displayed in the front,and do gmo ministop
For hostPage/createPaymentLink with currency=JPY,merchant_id='NTT',and selectedMethod=visa(web),icon display is the same as before, visa icon is selected by default,and do gmo -void the same day

systemQuery1: Refund request from NTT to NTT
refund request from NTT to gmo
refund response from gmo to NTT
Refund response from NTT to NTT
